clinical_study.brief_title: Clinical Evaluation of the QuantiFERON CMV Assay
clinical_study.official_title: Clinical Evaluation of the QuantiFERON CMV Assay

brief_summary.textblock: Validate the use of the device in the clinical setting for assessing the risk of CMV Infection in SOT recipients after the completion of antiviral prophylaxis.

primary_outcome.measure: Change in time to CMV Infection between sub-groups of QF-CMV assay classifications.
primary_outcome.time_frame: At time of prophylaxis termination, +1 month from termination, +2 months from termination

arm_group.description: Those receiving a SOT and coming off either 3 months or 6 months of antiviral prophylaxis.

intervention.description: Assay to measure cell-mediated immune function using QuantiFERON CMV assay.

study_pop.textblock: CMV D+/R- SOT recipients older than 18 that are receiving 3-6 months of antiviral prophylaxis and can provide Informed Consent.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Adult CMV D+/R- liver, kidney, heart, pancreas, lung, intestinal, or combined transplant recipients that are 18 years of age or older.
- Scheduled to receive between 3 to 6 months of antiviral prophylaxis
- Provide Informed Consent
Exclusion Criteria:
- Subjects less than 18 years old
- Scheduled to receive longer than 6 months or shorter than 3 months of prophylaxis
- Unable to provide Informed Consent
